ZoDu12928nPzUoAD.name: Zealous Restoration
ZoDu12928nPzUoAD.description: Miogimo can't regain Hit Points through resting or negative healing; he feeds only on the idealism of his supporters, regaining 10 Hit Points per day for each creature under the effects of a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Q690d3mw3TUrKX7E]{Geas} cast by Miogimo. Creatures under Miogimo's geas have their maximum HP reduced by 10 each day until they are burned away to a husk and perish. After 24 hours, such creatures rise as zeal-damned ghouls under Miogimo's control. Zeal-damned ghouls eat only the flesh of evil or chaotic creatures and deal an additional 1d6 chaotic and 1d6 negative damage with their attacks.

Hands Of The Forgotten.name: Agents of Edgewatch
Hands Of The Forgotten.description: Ethereal hands stretch out from the walls and floor, attempting to restrain nearby creatures.
Hands Of The Forgotten.hazardDisable: @Check[type:religion|dc:30|name:Exorcise Spirits] (master) to exorcise the spirits or @Check[type:intimidation|dc:32|name:Scare Away the Hands|traits:action:demoralize] (expert) to scare away the hands

if4c9s9m9SsMBYPG.description:
A tanglefoot bag is filled with sticky substances. When you hit a creature with a tanglefoot bag, that creature takes a -15-foot status penalty to its Speeds for 1 minute. You gain a +1 item bonus to attack rolls, and the Escape DC is 19.

On a critical hit, a creature in contact with a solid surface becomes stuck to the surface and immobilized for 1 round, and a creature flying via wings has its wings tangled, causing it to fall safely to the ground and become unable to Fly again for 1 round. Tanglefoot bags are not effective when used on a creature that is in water.

The target can end any effects by Escaping or spending a total of 3 actions to carefully remove the sticky substances. These Interact actions don't have to be consecutive, and other creatures can provide the actions as well.

4YTp0UYUC06RdaoE.description:
This plain silver ring has an almost oily sheen. While wearing the ring, you gain a +2 item bonus to Deception checks.

Activate D Interact

Effect Snapping your fingers on the hand that wears the ring causes the ring to cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.JyxTmqjYYn63V5LY]{Glibness} on you with no visual manifestations of a spell being cast.

YsaitQCNWkFcXQSi.description:
Activate 1 Interact

After you drink this mutagen, your body becomes thick and sturdy. You exhibit a healthy glow, though you tend to be ponderous and unobservant.

Benefit You gain a +3 item bonus to Fortitude saves and 30 temporary Hit Points. Whenever you are at maximum Hit Points for at least 1 full minute, you regain the temporary Hit Points. When you roll a success on a Fortitude save, you get a critical success instead.

Drawback You take a -2 penalty to Will saves, Perception checks and initiative rolls.

Duration 1 hour.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.xLilBqqf34ZJYO9i]{Effect: Juggernaut Mutagen (Greater)}

ZJvsVjbPWteUphTK.name: Concussive Beatdown
ZJvsVjbPWteUphTK.description:
Requirements Berleth has just used his shovel to Trip a creature

Effect Berleth brutally brings his shovel down on the prone foe, making a shovel Strike. On a hit, the Strike deals damage as normal, plus the target must make a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:30] save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1}.

Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 2}.

Critical Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 2} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1} for 1 minute.

hozDdAMhO9qf2Buo.name: Decapitate
hozDdAMhO9qf2Buo.description:
Berleth plunges his shovel through a creature's neck as though it were peat moss.

He makes a shovel Strike against an adjacent @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} creature. On a hit, the creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Yl48xTdMh3aeQYL2]{Wounded 2} (possibly @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.yZRUzMqrMmfLu0V1]{Dying}).

sTXhA6HFH3RVnqjV.name: Final Blow
sTXhA6HFH3RVnqjV.description:
Frequency once per day

Trigger Berleth is reduced to 0 HP

Effect Berleth makes a final shovel Strike before dying.

BofxZCq1wekuufql.name: Joro Spider Venom
BofxZCq1wekuufql.description:
Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:25]

Maximum Duration 6 rounds

Stage 1 [[/r 1d8[poison]]] (1 round)

Stage 2 [[/r 1d8[poison]]] and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} (1 round)

Stage 3 [[/r 1d8[poison]]] and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 2} (1 round)

Stage 4 [[/r 2d8[poison]]] and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paralyzed} ([[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds})

vZXFIePI3zP2Og1M.name: Web Trap
vZXFIePI3zP2Og1M.description: A creature hit by the joro spider's web Strike is immobilized and stuck to the nearest surface until it @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escapes} (DC 25).

Flying Guillotine.name: Agents of Edgewatch
Flying Guillotine.description: An invisible magical glyph on the guillotine's blade detects living creatures in the room, which causes the guillotine to fly off its hinges and attack.
Flying Guillotine.hazardDisable: @Check[type:thievery|dc:20|name:Erase Glyph|traits:action:disable-a-device] (trained) to erase the glyph (which requires a successful unarmed attack roll if the blade is already active) or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{Dispel Magic} (3rd level; counteract DC 20) to counteract it. The trap has a secret bypass known only to Ralso and Pratchett: as long as the guillotine can see a creature in the room touching thumb and pinky together with an empty hand, it remains dormant.
Flying Guillotine.hazardReset: After 1 minute, the trap deactivates, though the door remains locked. The trap rearms itself each day at dawn.
Flying Guillotine.hazardRoutine: (1 action) The blade @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.cS9nfDRGD83bNU1p]{Flies} up to 20 feet and Strikes any creatures whose squares it passes through. It cannot target the same creature more than once per round. The blade cannot be grappled and doesn't take a multiple attack penalty.

hJJc012AkwlepsfP.name: Odorless
hJJc012AkwlepsfP.description: A myrucarx emits no smell and can't be detected by scent.

2JN5a5P81ZqQkOsD.name: Painful Light
2JN5a5P81ZqQkOsD.description: When attempting a save against a light effect, a myrucarx gets a result one degree of success lower than it rolled. A myrucarx caught in sunlight is stunned 2 and clumsy 2.

87HtA52J9Oqfjsft.name: Illusory Persona
87HtA52J9Oqfjsft.description: The illusion created by the myrucarx's project image can resemble any Medium humanoid, including any specific individual it has seen, and has appropriate voice, scent, and mannerisms, allowing the myrucarx to use its Deception check to Impersonate that humanoid if it chooses.

e5D3G73TDu6XWskj.name: Twisting Reach
e5D3G73TDu6XWskj.description:
Frequency once per round

Effect The fanged mouths at the ends of a myrucarx's tendrils twist around obstacles. The myrucarx makes two jaws Strikes against the same target, ignoring the target's cover. Both attacks count toward the myrucarx's multiple attack penalty, but the penalty doesn't increase until after both attacks are made. The myrucarx can't Grab as its next action after Twisting Reach.

Ht4guo51Eky0gFrz.name: Partial Amphibian
Ht4guo51Eky0gFrz.description: The bregdi can breathe air for up to 10 minutes, or up to an hour so long as its skin remains wet.

CBZ2xBopPRbaMVV0.name: Capsize
CBZ2xBopPRbaMVV0.description: The bregdi tries to capsize an adjacent aquatic vessel of its size or smaller. It must succeed at an Athletics check with a DC of 35 (reduced by 5 for each size smaller the vessel is than the bregdi) or the pilot's Sailing Lore DC, whichever is higher.

ObuiuOqfP6nhvs9S.name: Tug
ObuiuOqfP6nhvs9S.description:
The bregdi pulls a creature it can reach or a creature holding something it can reach (such as a fishing line in the water).

The bregdi attempts an Athletics check against the creature's Fortitude DC. On a success, it pulls the creature into an adjacent space. On a critical success, the bregdi can also make a jaws Strike against the creature pulled into an adjacent space.

26ZZztmP0cFmWp6x.name: Precise Tremorsense 40 feet
26ZZztmP0cFmWp6x.description:
The cobbleswarm's tremorsense is a precise sense out to 40 feet and an imprecise sense out to 80 feet. The cobbleswarm can't sense anything beyond the range of its tremorsense.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.Tremorsense]

TBb2TTPl5fRKJQJU.name: Grasping Bites
TBb2TTPl5fRKJQJU.description:
The cobbleswarm attempts an Athletics check and compares the result to the Fortitude DC of all creatures in its space.

Critical Success The creature falls @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone} and takes [[/r 1d6[bludgeoning]]] damage, and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Restrained} by the cobbleswarm until the end of the cobbleswarm's next turn.

Success The creature falls prone, and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} by the cobbleswarm until the creature until the end of the cobbleswarm's next turn.

S00gbcUTroHxccVJ.name: Pummeling Assault
S00gbcUTroHxccVJ.description: Each enemy in the cobbleswarm's space takes [[/r 2d4[bludgeoning]]] damage (@Check[type:reflex|dc:17|basic:true] save).

Mr. Snips.name: Mr. Snips
Mr. Snips.description: Traditionally crafted into the forms of giant suits of armor or powerful animals, iron golems are products of exquisite artistry and skill. Their articulated joints and sturdy armored bodies require great care and mathematical precision to craft, and regular cleaning and oiling ensure they don't rust over the ages. With proper care, iron golems can remain in good shape for thousands of years, being passed down for generations, as long as they aren't destroyed by meddlesome adventurers. In addition to their incredible strength, iron golems possess a potent toxic breath weapon that is often more than enough to dispatch entire groups of opponents.

lYvWF5v5Vah9KWsN.name: Golem Antimagic
lYvWF5v5Vah9KWsN.description:
harmed by acid (6d10, 2d8 from areas and persistent damage); healed by fire (area 2d8 HP); slowed by electricity

A golem is immune to spells and magical abilities other than its own, but each type of golem is affected by a few types of magic in special ways. These exceptions are listed in shortened form in the golem's stat block, with the full rules appearing here. If an entry lists multiple types (such as "cold and water"), either type of spell can affect the golem. Harmed By Any magic of this type that targets the golem causes it to take the listed amount of damage (this damage has no type) instead of the usual effect. If the golem starts its turn in an area of magic of this type or is affected by a persistent effect of the appropriate type, it takes the damage listed in the parenthetical. Healed By Any magic of this type that targets the golem makes the golem lose the slowed condition and gain HP equal to half the damage the spell would have dealt. If the golem starts its turn in an area of this type of magic, it gains the HP listed in the parenthetical. Slowed By Any magic of this type that targets the golem causes it to be slowed 1 for [[/br 2d6 #rounds]]{2d6 rounds} instead of the usual effect. If the golem starts its turn in an area of this type of magic, it's slowed 1 for that round. Vulnerable To Each golem is vulnerable to one or more specific spells, with the effects described in its stat block.

aMNM0X0dVvVRdlZT.name: Vulnerable to Neutralize Poison
aMNM0X0dVvVRdlZT.description: Casting @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.SUKaxVZW2TlM8lu0]{Neutralize Poison} on the golem deactivates its Breath Weapon for 1 minute.

SJraLZmz7x1C04ki.name: Vulnerable to Rust
SJraLZmz7x1C04ki.description: Magical rusting effects, like a rust monster's antennae, affect the iron golem normally.

HkUjt1e6CiwdfHoy.name: Breath Weapon
HkUjt1e6CiwdfHoy.description: The iron golem exhales poisonous gas in a 10-foot radius centered on the corner of one of the iron golem's squares. The gas persists for 1 round. Any creature in the area (or that later enters the area) is exposed to the iron golem's poison. The golem can't use its Breath Weapon again for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}.

yhVKDXeyQEVchPJW.name: Dismember
yhVKDXeyQEVchPJW.description:
Whenever Mr. Snips rolls a critical hit with a scissors Strike, in addition to dealing extra damage, the golem has a chance to dismember its victim. The target must roll a @Check[type:reflex|dc:39|traits:damaging-effect] save.

Success No additional effect

Failure The target takes [[/r 2d10[bleed]]].

Critical Failure As failure, and one of the targets extremities is severed (the effects of this are up to the GM's discretion).

nhz5F428cTKGkc9v.name: Inexorable March
nhz5F428cTKGkc9v.description: The iron golem Strides up to its Speed, pushing back each creature whose space it moves into and damaging them if they try to stop its movement. A creature can attempt to bar the way by succeeding at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:37] save. On a critical success, the resisting creature takes no damage; otherwise, it is damaged as if hit by the golem's fist.

RSzJjCjwpz8jIS3J.name: Iron Golem Poison
RSzJjCjwpz8jIS3J.description:
Any @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained} value from this poison is reduced by 1 every hour.

Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:33]

Maximum Duration 4 rounds

Stage 1 2d6 poison and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1} (1 round)

Stage 2 4d6 poison and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 2} (1 round)

Stage 3 8d6 poison and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 3} (1 round).

2A9TNsqY3jsY4TNh.name: Blade of the Rabbit Prince
2A9TNsqY3jsY4TNh.description:
This +2 greater striking dancing shortsword has a golden handguard resembling a bird with outstretched wings. The sword's blade is broken halfway up its length, but this doesn't impair the sword's function.

Activate 1 command, Interact

Effect You attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{Trip} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{Disarm} an opponent using Thievery instead of Athletics, and you add the blade of the Rabbit Prince's item bonus to the check. You do not need to have a hand free if you're wielding the blade of the Rabbit Prince, and your target can be up to two sizes larger than you.

Craft Requirements You must craft the blade in the Harrowed Realm.

OofTe2WDiLiEdYTm.name: Halfling Luck
OofTe2WDiLiEdYTm.description:
Frequency once per day

Trigger The Rabbit Prince fails a skill check or a saving throw

Effect The Rabbit Prince rerolls the triggering check, but he must use the new result, even if it's worse.

CgEMdYYlkqnUPBfB.name: Perfect Will
CgEMdYYlkqnUPBfB.description: If the Rabbit Prince rolls a success on a Will save, he gets a critical success instead, and if he rolls a critical failure, he gets a failure instead.

cg0RVhBfO8MxjPpI.name: Superior Senses
cg0RVhBfO8MxjPpI.description: The Rabbit Prince automatically critically succeeds at Seek actions to find hidden or undetected creatures within 30 feet and at flat checks to target creatures within 30 feet that are concealed or hidden from him.

9KEf9z8ZVsw7qXJg.name: Bloody Jab
9KEf9z8ZVsw7qXJg.description: Whenever the Rabbit Prince deals piercing damage, he also deals [[/r 2d10[bleed]]].

s4YFi2Scm3NoZSHU.name: Darting Flurry
s4YFi2Scm3NoZSHU.description: The Rabbit Prince Strides and makes a blade of the Rabbit Prince Strike and a harrow card Strike at any point during the Stride. His multiple attack penalty increases only after both attacks.

2EL49f3yp855RUpq.name: Quick Movements
2EL49f3yp855RUpq.description: The Rabbit Prince doesn't trigger reactions with his movement or with any use of the Thievery skill.

UYn0m6msQksZeSqS.name: Exorcism
UYn0m6msQksZeSqS.description:
Mental damage ignores a siege shard's hardness.

Additionally, proving the siege shard's generative conflict is over with the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Ma93dpT4K7JbP9gu]{Prove Peace} activity reverts the creature to ordinary stone.

jcfMZ2vEUL2nEfFQ.name: Surreptitious Siege
jcfMZ2vEUL2nEfFQ.description: While a siege shard is embedded within a structure while using @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.vh1RpbWfqdNC4L3P]{Meld into Stone}, the structure and all objects within it take twice as long to repair.

g67xAp632gfQapHl.name: Overwhelming Anguish
g67xAp632gfQapHl.description:
Frequency once per minute

Effect The siege shard emits a disorienting psychic blast. All creatures within a 15 feet emanation take [[/r 4d6[mental]]] damage (@Check[type:will|dc:20|basic:true] save).

SoEJRrsphmHa4aoG.name: Rejuvenation
SoEJRrsphmHa4aoG.description:
When a siege shard is destroyed within 100 feet of a structure, it reforms after [[/br 2d4 #days]] days within the nearest structure, fully healed.

A siege shard within a structure can permanently destroyed by the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.adventure-specific-actions.QW2gYIKce3W31xXf]{Prove Peace} activity.

Arcane Feedback Trap.name: Agents of Edgewatch
Arcane Feedback Trap.description: A spike of stone bursts from the south wall and quickly retracts.
Arcane Feedback Trap.hazardDisable: @Check[type:arcana|dc:33|name:Quell Rippling Stone] (master) to quell the rippling stone or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{Dispel Magic} (7th level, counteract DC 31) to dispel the magical feedback.

yX6VKlUamzU5KOQr.name: Bonesense (Imprecise) 30 feet
yX6VKlUamzU5KOQr.description: A giant bone skipper identifies bones and creatures with a skeletal system in the listed range.

Ptf4oQIP2T6623QL.name: Leaping Charge
Ptf4oQIP2T6623QL.description: The giant bone skipper @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.d5I6018Mci2SWokk]{Leaps} up to 20 feet. It then makes a mandibles Strike, gaining a +1 circumstance bonus to its attack roll.

H2cjvx6x95qaiQFo.name: Marrow Rot
H2cjvx6x95qaiQFo.description:
Marrow rot affects only creatures with a skeletal system

Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:25|traits:disease]

Onset 1 day

Stage 1 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1} (1 day)

Stage 2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2} (1 day)

Stage 3 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1} (1 day)

Avsheros the Betrayer.name: Avsheros the Betrayer
Avsheros the Betrayer.npcAllSaves: +1 status to all saves vs. magic

B8N51wc1bGZzdZ7d.name: Hateful Gaze
B8N51wc1bGZzdZ7d.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:60]{60 feet} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{Aura}

When a creature ends its turn in the aura, it must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:45] save. If the creature fails, it is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1} (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 2} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 2} on a critical failure).

Avsheros can deactivate or activate this aura using a single action, which has the concentrate trait.

No matter the result of the save, a creature can't be affected by Avsheros's hateful gaze again for 1 minute.

WaEIc7jlHfXb63gH.name: Blasphemous Arms
WaEIc7jlHfXb63gH.description: Any weapon gains the effects of an @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.gmMrJREf4JSHd2dZ]{Unholy} property rune while Avsheros wields it.

AkqOlXLB6K0JLoqz.name: Wail of the Betrayed
AkqOlXLB6K0JLoqz.description:
Avsheros lets out an agonized wail that invokes grief and a feeling of betrayal in those who hear it.

All creatures within 120 feet must succeed at a @Check[type:will|dc:47] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 2}. A creature frightened in this way can't willingly accept aid of any kind from an ally until the frightened condition is removed.

On a successful save, the creature is immune to Avsheros's Wail of the Betrayed for 24 hours.

Dreadsong Dancer.name: Dreadsong Dancer
Dreadsong Dancer.npcAllSaves: +2 status to all saves vs. composition spells

cNdgAyzrxvT3Z68j.name: +2 Status to All Saves vs. Composition Spells

4QRkjb5aTrVTZYRO.name: Jealous Musician
4QRkjb5aTrVTZYRO.description:
Trigger A creature plays an instrument while Casting a Spell or casts a composition spell within 20 feet of the dreadsong dancer

Effect The dreadsong dancer Strides up to 20 feet and makes a songblade Strike against the triggering creature. If the Strike hits, the spell is disrupted.

oaYvNv83OSKkOI6V.name: Performance Anxiety
oaYvNv83OSKkOI6V.description:
A dreadsong dancer is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1} if they see or hear a creature critically succeed at a Performance check or at a saving throw against their Dreadsong.

The dreadsong dancer is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Quickened 1} for 1 round if they see or hear a creature critically fail at a Performance check or a saving throw against their Dreadsong.

They can use the extra action only to Stride or Strike.

8K2BcPcACmOHHydT.name: Dreadsong
8K2BcPcACmOHHydT.description:
The dreadsong dancer whirls their howling songblades and cloaks themself in illusion magic. Each non-fiend creature in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:30] from the dreadsong dancer must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:29] save.

Critical Success No effect, and the creature is temporarily immune for 24 hours. The dreadsong dancer is affected by their performance anxiety.

Success The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}.

Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 2}, and the dreadsong dancer is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{Undetected} by the creature for 1 minute. The creature can't use Seek to find the dreadsong dancer.

Critical Failure As failure, but the creature can't reduce its frightened condition below 2 for 1 minute. In addition, the dreadsong dancer is affected by its performance anxiety.

xxxZ0reFCEDypJhH.description:
Symbols of musical notes decorate this gold-framed wooden cube measuring just under 1 foot by 1 foot. A funnel-shaped trumpet protrudes from the box's top at an angle, though it feels surprisingly light. The box has a large button on its side, and it must be set down on a flat surface in order to activate it; while it's activated, the rumbling and churning gears inside the box make it impossible to carry without dropping it.

ActivateAInteract;Effect You press the button on the side of the music box, causing it to erupt with a cacophonous and discordant melody for 1 minute while it plays its entire melody, and it can't be shut off prematurely. The music is so loud that any creature within 60 feet must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:24] or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{Deafened} for as long as they remain within 60 feet of the music box, and for 1 minute thereafter. On a critical success, a creature need not make any more saves and is temporarily immune to thedeafening music boxfor the next 24 hours; on a success, the creature must attempt a new save each round it remains within 60 feet of the music box.

XQXyh2fMab1x1Hjh.description:
Giant centipede venom causes severe muscle stiffness.

Activate D Interact (Injury)

Saving Throw DC 17 Fortitude

Maximum Duration 6 rounds

Stage 1 [[/r 1d6[poison]]] damage (1 round)

Stage 2 [[/r 1d8[poison]]] damage and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} (1 round)

Stage 3 [[/r 1d12[poison]]] damage, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1}, and flat-footed (1 round)

ePXkUAkuSGauQ7Jv.name: Supersonic Hearing
ePXkUAkuSGauQ7Jv.description: Mobana has spent years in close proximity to the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.k9BYXA4b7Z4Hy6lZ]{Deafening Music Box} in her possession and is immune to its effects. She also gains a +2 circumstance bonus against sonic effects and effects that impose the deafened condition

2w1WQr635JVnsORb.name: Swift Sneak
2w1WQr635JVnsORb.description: Mobana can move her full speed when @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.VMozDqMMuK5kpoX4]{Sneaking}.

zeH3OrBLioIRoYb5.name: Deny Advantage
zeH3OrBLioIRoYb5.description: Mobana isn't @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} to creatures of 8th level or lower that are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{Undetected}, flanking or using @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.w6rMqmGzhUahdnA7]{Surprise Attack}.

xhZKk4oQRgs08i0T.name: Nimble Dodge
xhZKk4oQRgs08i0T.description:
Trigger Mobana is targeted with a melee or ranged attack by an attacker they can see.

Effect Mobana gains a +2 ciurcumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack.

cYpzRpaINHeW2XxC.name: Poison Weapon
cYpzRpaINHeW2XxC.description:
Requirements Mobana is wielding a piercing or slashing weapon and has a free hand.

Effect Mobana applies a poison to the weapon.

kzNiR7bLBxL4aWfR.name: Quick Draw
kzNiR7bLBxL4aWfR.description: Mobana Interacts to draw a weapon, then Strikes with that weapon.

CWcYZHN9MSfxTR2k.description:
Mobana deals an extra 2d6 precision damage to flat-footed creatures.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.SneakAttack]

t5skSqnTS4aKuuan.name: Surprise Attack
t5skSqnTS4aKuuan.description: On the first round of combat, creatures that haven't acted yet are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} to the assassin.

ZfMUXnwfQvzxGYlX.name: +1 Striking Heavy Crossbow
ZfMUXnwfQvzxGYlX.description: This large crossbow is harder to load and more substantial than a regular crossbow, but it packs a greater punch.

sCeV7i5ftZVT9d83.name: +2 Greater Striking axiomatic Scourge
sCeV7i5ftZVT9d83.description: A scourge-also known as a cat-o'-nine-tails-is a set of several knotted cords made from cotton or leather and attached to a handle. While most scourges are more suitable for torture than combat, the weapons used by the Order of the Scourge have metal barbs woven in to pierce clothing and armor. The scourge is a martial melee weapon.

9TY6byP3620OyD3n.name: +2 Resilient Hellknight Plate
9TY6byP3620OyD3n.description: Few armors in the Inner Sea region are as memorable as the iconic Hellknight plate. While each order has its own flourishes, Hellknight plate is instantly recognizable to any who know of the Hellknights. Hellknights go to extreme measures to punish non-Hellknights who get their hands on Hellknight plate, and the reward is not usually worth the risk, since for non-Hellknights, the armor is functionally similar to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Gq1cZWSKOtJhKd2p]{Full Plate}.

745PY8vNnU4dRB3J.name: Diabolic Certitude
745PY8vNnU4dRB3J.description: When making a Recall Knowledge check about a devil she's observing, whenever Calennia rolls a critical failure, she gets a failure instead.

AuIi30v2cCwEK9Oy.name: Flog Mercilessly
AuIi30v2cCwEK9Oy.description: Calennia Strikes with her scourge. On a hit, she rolls damage three times. This damage is combined (for the purpose of overcoming damage resistance, for example).

034N8wrms1VjpEX4.name: Terrible Justice
034N8wrms1VjpEX4.description:
Trigger A living creature within 30 feet is reduced to 0 Hit Points

Effect Calennia targets the creature with a death knell spell (DC 34). If the target dies, all of Calennia's enemies within 60 feet are targeted by a fear spell (DC 34). A creature that succeeds at either save is temporarily immune to this ability for 24 hours.

mOEFev3A3LvUINAz.name: Deep Breath
mOEFev3A3LvUINAz.description: A ravenile can hold their breath for 20 minutes.

3vUeNTCG7OjIBa45.name: Forced Regeneration
3vUeNTCG7OjIBa45.description:
Requirements The ravenile's regeneration is currently active

The ravenile regains [[/r 20[healing]]] HP.

Av9NysCBnGty9we0.name: Furious Wallop
Av9NysCBnGty9we0.description:
Requirements The ravenile's regeneration is currently deactivated

Effect The ravenile makes a melee Strike.

This counts as two attacks for the ravenile's multiple attack penalty.

If this Strike hits, the ravenile deals an extra die of weapon damage and the target falls @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}.

Acidic Poison Cloud Trap.name: Agents of Edgewatch
Acidic Poison Cloud Trap.description: Five nozzles hidden across the apartment's ceiling spew thick clouds of acidic poison from a reinforced tank behind the wall.
Acidic Poison Cloud Trap.hazardDisable: @Check[type:thievery|dc:35|name:Block One Nozzle|traits:action:disable-a-device] (expert) to block one of the nozzles or @Check[type:thievery|dc:40|name:Shut Off the Tank|traits:action:disable-a-device] (master) to shut off the tank. The trap deactivates after 5 rounds, once the tank is empty.
Acidic Poison Cloud Trap.hazardRoutine: (1 action) When it's triggered, the trap has five active nozzles, but at the end of its turn each round, one random nozzle deactivates. On the trap's turn, the active nozzles emit a cloud of acidic poison gas that expands to fill the apartment. The cloud deals [[/r 1d6[acid]]] damage and [[/r 1d6[poison]]] damage per active nozzle to each creature and object in the room (@Check[type:fortitude|dc:33|basic:true|name:Spew Cloud|traits:poison] save). Unattended objects automatically fail saves to avoid the damage.

C01m9GnZW7b5Uk9K.name: Shadow Step
C01m9GnZW7b5Uk9K.description:
The svartalfar killer fades into shadow, Strides up to twice its Speed, and reforms.

This movement doesn't trigger reactions, but the svartalfar killer must begin and end in an area of dim light or darkness.

1sozJvnrR9nNQ2qu.description:
A svartalfar killer deals an extra 2d6 precision damage to flat-footed creatures.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.SneakAttack]

8RfMfocN311lqv8N.name: Spell-Imbued Blade
8RfMfocN311lqv8N.description:
The svartalfar killer chooses @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.gISYsBFby1TiXfBt]{Acid Splash}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.O9w7r4BKgPogYDDe]{Produce Flame}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.J7Y7tl0bbdz7TcCc]{Ray of Enfeeblement}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.r3NeUnsgt9mS03Sn]{Shocking Grasp} and makes a melee Strike.

If the svartalfar killer hits, they cast the chosen spell through the weapon at the same target. The spell's attack roll is the same result as the Strike.

OF6N85WER1HxJgCK.name: Integrated Launcher
OF6N85WER1HxJgCK.description: A projectile launcher is integrated into a clockwork assassin's systems, containing 10 spinning blades and five smoke bombs. When the assassin is destroyed, the launcher and its ammunition are also destroyed.

yOvz4I15CCPk78ns.name: Smoke Vision
yOvz4I15CCPk78ns.description: The clockwork assassin ignores the concealed condition from smoke.

q4WljID3qrZ5Fpnr.name: Wind-Up
q4WljID3qrZ5Fpnr.description: For the clockwork assassin to act, it must be wound with a unique key by another creature. This takes 1 minute. Once wound, it remains operational for 24 hours, after which time it becomes unaware of its surroundings and can't act until it's wound again.The assassin can enter standby mode as a 3-action activity. Its operational time doesn't decrease in standby, but it can sense its surroundings (with a -2 penalty to Perception). It can't act, with one exception: when it perceives a creature, it can exit standby as a reaction (rolling initiative if appropriate).A creature can attempt a @Check[type:thievery|dc:33|name:Wind Down|traits:manipulate,action:disable-a-device] check to Disable a Device to wind the assassin down. For each success, the assassin loses 1 hour of operational time. This can be done even if the assassin is in standby mode.

McLV2Lx51f0UF1YX.name: Poison Ink
McLV2Lx51f0UF1YX.description:
Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:38]

Maximum Duration 10 rounds

Stage 1 [[/r 3d6[poison]]] damage and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1} (1 round)

Stage 2 [[/r 4d6[poison]]] damage and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 2} (1 round).

mmdbAeOOVVjLALCx.name: Rapid Repair
mmdbAeOOVVjLALCx.description: The clockwork assassin spends 1 hour of its operational time to repair itself, regaining 25 Hit Points and refilling its integrated projectile launcher with 4 spinning blades (to a maximum of 10) and 2 smoke bombs (to a maximum of 5).

A7VgvFTQFpm1Cc79.name: Smoke Bomb Launcher
A7VgvFTQFpm1Cc79.description: The clockwork assassin launches a smoke bomb. A screen of thick, opaque smoke fills a @Template[type:burst|distance:10] within 60 feet of the clockwork assassin. Creatures within the area are concealed, and all other creatures are concealed to them. The smoke lasts for 1 minute or until dispersed by a strong wind.

Y7P7UpMZajGcxNz4.name: Sneak Attack
Y7P7UpMZajGcxNz4.description: The clockwork assassin's Strikes deal an additional 3d6+4 precision damage to flat-footed creatures.

GtoDWNmX34925xMc.name: Unbalancing Blow
GtoDWNmX34925xMc.description: Creatures hit by the clockwork assassin's rapier hand Strike are flat-footed until the start of the clockwork assassin's next turn.

Ink Drowning Vats.name: Agents of Edgewatch
Ink Drowning Vats.description: Steel hatch doors automatically lock shut in each of the four vats labeled J2. Four ink spouts (one per vat) jut through a narrow aperture in the ceiling of each vat, 20 feet above.
Ink Drowning Vats.hazardDisable: @Check[type:thievery|dc:40|name:Seal an Ink Spout|traits:action:disable-a-device] (master) to seal an ink spout, @Check[type:thievery|dc:48|name:Unlock a Door|traits:action:pick-a-lock] (master) to unlock a steel hatch door, or @Check[type:athletics|dc:45|name:Force Open a Door|traits:action:force-open] (master) to Force Open a steel hatch door
Ink Drowning Vats.hazardReset: The trap can be reset by refilling the ink storage tanks above the vats.
Ink Drowning Vats.hazardRoutine: (4 actions) The trap loses 1 action for each disabled ink spout. On each of the trap's actions, a spout pours ink, increasing the depth of the ink in that vat by 2 feet. Creatures standing in the ink are exposed to a dose of poison ink. Once the vat is full of ink, the trap stops using actions, but creatures in the vat might start drowning.

E3ItzWH7n7tJ4AB0.name: Entropy Sense (Imprecise) 60 feet
E3ItzWH7n7tJ4AB0.description:
Il'setya can anticipate the most likely location of a creature through their supernatural insight into the forces of chaotic probabilities and chance. This grants Il'setya the ability to sense creatures within the listed range.

The Il'setya's entropy sense doesn't detect creatures under the effects of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.EoKBlgf6Smt8opaU]{Nondetection} or that are otherwise shielded from divinations and predictions.

ZaivUgHp2bK6CmBQ.name: Protean Anatomy 10
ZaivUgHp2bK6CmBQ.description:
Il'setya's vital organs shift and change shape and position constantly. Immediately after Il'setya takes acid, electricity, or sonic damage, she gains the listed amount of resistance to that damage type. This lasts for 1 hour or until the next time she takes damage of one of the other types (in which case its resistance changes to match that type), whichever comes first.

Il'setya is immune to polymorph effects unless she is a willing target. If @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{Deafened}, Il'setya automatically recovers at the end of its next turn as new sensory organs grow to replace the compromised ones.

Tillz0YYXHueJmui.name: Dimensional Slide
Tillz0YYXHueJmui.description:
Frequency twice per day

Effect Il'setsya steps through a transient hole in space, instantly teleporting to a space within 60 feet that she can see.

yMXbFPudLdFxCrfJ.name: Prehensile Tail
yMXbFPudLdFxCrfJ.description: Il'setsya's prehensile tail can hold and manipulate objects of Light Bulk or less, though it cannot be used to attack. She can spend an Interact action to use her tail to fetch objects stowed on her person, such as potions.

5rYhqUb2YVDE98ag.name: Warpwave Spell
5rYhqUb2YVDE98ag.description:
Il'setsya infuses her next spell with roiling currents of chaos.

If Il'setsya Casts a Spell before her turn is over and the spell affects a creature, that creature is also subject to a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.rollable-tables.yRZwPolTnRdnz42V]{Warpwave}.

If she doesn't Cast a Spell before the beginning of her next turn, this action is wasted.

PTHHSvW8TM9Qoy4r.name: +1 Striking Shortsword
PTHHSvW8TM9Qoy4r.description: These blades come in a variety of shapes and styles, but they are typically 2 feet long.

sqgbfXYmkJqyZ1xu.name: Bloodseeker Beak
sqgbfXYmkJqyZ1xu.description:
This long, hollow proboscis is harvested from the notorious bloodseeker beast and drips a trickle of blood.

Activate F Envision

Trigger You hit a flat-footed creature with the affixed weapon

When you activate the beak, you deal an extra 1d4 precision damage on your damage roll. If you deal sneak attack damage to the creature, you also deal [[/r 1d4[bleed]]].

TAic4n8t4egJtNJX.name: Deny Advantage
TAic4n8t4egJtNJX.description: The poisoner isn't flat-footed to creatures of 11th level or lower that are hidden, undetected, flanking, or using surprise attack.

HLLn9CHqmRrWk4IN.name: Nimble Dodge
HLLn9CHqmRrWk4IN.description:
Trigger The poisoner is targeted with a melee or ranged attack by an attacker it can see

Effect The poisoner gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack.

va3CnUqjuHNbajzr.name: Impromptu Toxin
va3CnUqjuHNbajzr.description:
Cost 1 batch of infused reagents

Effect The poisoner dribbles a few experimental chemicals over a melee weapon. Until the start of their next turn, Strikes with the weapon deal an additional [[/r 2d8[poison]]] damage, and targets hit by Strikes with the weapon must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:27|traits:damaging-effect] save or become enfeebled 1 or clumsy 1 (the poisoner's choice) for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}.

pWF0uGOYSVrS0HHX.description:
The poisoner deals an additional 3d6 precision damage to flat-footed creatures.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.SneakAttack]

ZX0T6lbLJyKn8KuN.name: Unbalancing Blow
ZX0T6lbLJyKn8KuN.description: Creatures the poisoner hits with a critical hit are flat-footed against their attacks until the end of their next turn.

Hidden Chute.name: Agents of Edgewatch
Hidden Chute.description: A trapdoor in the floor conceals a stone chute.
Hidden Chute.hazardDisable: @Check[type:thievery|dc:20|name:Remove Trapdoor|traits:action:disable-a-device] (trained) to remove the trapdoor or lock it in position using a catch hidden inside the room's doorframe

e43f6ELGQuh0SRwH.name: +1 Chain Mail
e43f6ELGQuh0SRwH.description: A suit of chain mail consists of several pieces of armor composed of small metal rings linked together in a protective mesh. It typically includes a chain shirt, leggings, a pair of arms, and a coif, collectively protecting most of the body.

pm2UDJOO9oyox9Os.name: Storm Arrow
pm2UDJOO9oyox9Os.description:
The head of this arrow is made from gleaming copper. When an activated storm arrow hits a target, it is buffeted by raging winds and struck by a bolt of lightning that deals 3d12 electricity damage and the target must attempt a DC 25 Reflex saving throw. If this arrow is shot from a weapon with a shock property rune, the save DC increases to 27, though the attack doesn't benefit from the shock property rune itself.

Activate A Interact

Critical Success The foe is unaffected.

Success The foe takes half damage and isn't affected by the wind.

Failure The foe takes full damage and is buffeted by winds for 1 round, taking a -2 circumstance penalty to ranged attack rolls and a -10-foot circumstance penalty to its fly Speed.

Critical Failure As failure, but the foe takes double damage.

cerEbvB6QEc8UcuU.name: No Escape
cerEbvB6QEc8UcuU.description:
Trigger An enemy within reach of the Black Whale guard attempts to move away

Effect The guard Strides up to their Speed, following the enemy and keeping the enemy in reach throughout its movement until the enemy stops moving or the guard moves their full Speed.

SLWi3J2O0e3QXfYB.name: Clobber
SLWi3J2O0e3QXfYB.description: The guard makes a club Strike. On a hit, if the target is flat-footed, the target must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:33] save or be stunned 2.

157GGkuQcvXmLwPu.name: Hammering Flurry
157GGkuQcvXmLwPu.description: The guard makes three club Strikes against a single target, ignoring the multiple attack penalty until after all three attacks are completed.

jC7yNSXPp6Y4dqOF.name: Nightmare Assault
jC7yNSXPp6Y4dqOF.description:
Frequency Once per day

The prison guard makes a club Strike. On a hit, the target must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:36] save.

Critical Success The target is unaffected and becomes immune to this ability for 24 hours.

Success The target is unaffected.

Failure The target is plagued by nightmarish visiona and becomes fatigued.

Critical Failure The target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigued} and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 2} until no longer fatigued

CUtiSdjK9OwxIfKR.name: Shatter Defenses
CUtiSdjK9OwxIfKR.description:
Requirements A frightened creature is within melee reach of the Black Whale guard

Effect The guard makes a melee Strike against the frightened creature. If they hit and deal damage, the target becomes flat-footed as long as it's frightened. If the target is already flat-footed, it can't reduce its frightened value below 1 until the start of the guard's next turn.

Greater Planar Rift.name: Agents of Edgewatch
Greater Planar Rift.description: A ragged planar rift drags things into its depths and hurls creatures through from its terminal end.
Greater Planar Rift.hazardDisable: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{Dispel Magic} (9th level; counteract DC 46) to seal the rift

3g9fOfW6T5VklwH5.name: Compression
3g9fOfW6T5VklwH5.description: When a shredskin successfully @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.kMcV8e5EZUxa6evt]{Squeezes}, it moves through the tight space at full speed. Narrow confines are not difficult terrain for a shredskin.

QozBQD2QZP7kMYOG.name: Control Body
QozBQD2QZP7kMYOG.description:
Requirements The shredskin is adjacent to a Medium or Small humanoid-shaped corpse

Effect The shredskin wraps itself around the corpse and takes control of the host body. While controlling a host, the shredskin uses the host's Speed but its own attacks, and it loses its Grab and Enshroud abilities.

Attacks that target the shredskin while it controls a body deal half of the damage to the shredskin and half of the damage to the host body. Attacks that target an area deal damage to both the shredskin and host body normally.

The shredskin can release the host body as a free action at the start of its turn. If the host is destroyed, the shredskin automatically releases the body and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} for 1 round. A Medium corpse typically has 15 hit points, while a Small corpse typically has 10 Hit Points.

Creatures can notice that a corpse is controlled by a shredskin by succeeding a Perception check against the shredskin's Deception DC.

DGsILrvl3LJIeZIu.name: Enshroud
DGsILrvl3LJIeZIu.description:
Requirements The shredskin is grabbing a creature

Effect The shredskin attempts to pin the creature and wrap itself around the creature like a shirt. The shredskin rolls an Athletics check against the creature's Fortitude DC.

On a success, the creature becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Restrained} and the shredskin can take control of the creature as if using Control Body.

At the start of its turn, the shredskin can automatically Constrict the enshrouded creature as a free action.

An enshrouded creature can attempt a DC 16 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escape} check to break free (DC 18 if the shredskin critically succeeded its Athletics check to Enshroud).

HNYjS5WAb54frbpw.name: Charming Liar
HNYjS5WAb54frbpw.description:
When Gage gets a critical success using the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.action-macros.VTg4t8kYTvXcHROq]{Lie} action, the target's attitude toward him improves by one step, as though he'd succeeded at using Diplomacy to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.OX4fy22hQgUHDr0q]{Make an Impression}.

This works only once per conversation, and if he critically succeeds against multiple targets using the same result, he chooses one creature's attitude to improve.

To use this ability, Gage must be lying to impart seemingly important information, inflate his status, or ingratiate himself, which trivial or irrelevant lies can't achieve.

35yXdy43dCClA3wy.name: Smooth Operator
35yXdy43dCClA3wy.description:
When Gage meets a group of up to five people, he can immediately attempt a Diplomacy check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.action-macros.1Sj2Pz3VI2SFWqZw]{Make an Impression}, comparing the result to the Will DC of each target.

He takes a -3 penalty on this check, and it is possible to get different degrees of success for each target. If he fails or critically fails, he can engage in 1 minute of conversation and attempt a new check at the end of that time rather than accepting the failure or critical failure result.

R1OmPKgnrpEPWGr6.name: Attack of Opportunity
R1OmPKgnrpEPWGr6.description:
Trigger A creature within the monster's reach uses a manipulate action or a move action, makes a ranged attack, or leaves a square during a move action it's using.

Effect The monster attempts a melee Strike against the triggering creature. If the attack is a critical hit and the trigger was a manipulate action, the monster disrupts that action. This Strike doesn't count toward the monster's multiple attack penalty, and its multiple attack penalty doesn't apply to this Strike.

OF6N85WER1HxJgCK.name: Integrated Launcher
OF6N85WER1HxJgCK.description: A projectile launcher is integrated into a clockwork assassin's systems, containing 10 spinning blades and five smoke bombs. When the assassin is destroyed, the launcher and its ammunition are also destroyed.

yOvz4I15CCPk78ns.name: Smoke Vision
yOvz4I15CCPk78ns.description: The clockwork assassin ignores the concealed condition from smoke.

q4WljID3qrZ5Fpnr.name: Wind-Up
q4WljID3qrZ5Fpnr.description: For the clockwork assassin to act, it must be wound with a unique key by another creature. This takes 1 minute. Once wound, it remains operational for 24 hours, after which time it becomes unaware of its surroundings and can't act until it's wound again. The assassin can enter standby mode as a 3-action activity. Its operational time doesn't decrease in standby, but it can sense its surroundings (with a -2 penalty to Perception). It can't act, with one exception: when it perceives a creature, it can exit standby as a reaction (rolling initiative if appropriate).A creature can attempt a @Check[type:thievery|dc:31|name:Wind Down|traits:manipulate,action:disable-a-device] check to Disable a Device to wind the assassin down. For each success, the assassin loses 1 hour of operational time. This can be done even if the assassin is in standby mode.

mmdbAeOOVVjLALCx.name: Rapid Repair
mmdbAeOOVVjLALCx.description: The clockwork assassin spends 1 hour of its operational time to repair itself, regaining 25 Hit Points and refilling its integrated projectile launcher with 4 spinning blades (to a maximum of 10) and 2 smoke bombs (to a maximum of 5).

A7VgvFTQFpm1Cc79.name: Smoke Bomb Launcher
A7VgvFTQFpm1Cc79.description: The clockwork assassin launches a smoke bomb. A screen of thick, opaque smoke fills a @Template[type:burst|distance:10] within 60 feet of the clockwork assassin. Creatures within the area are concealed, and all other creatures are concealed to them. The smoke lasts for 1 minute or until dispersed by a strong wind.

Y7P7UpMZajGcxNz4.name: Sneak Attack
Y7P7UpMZajGcxNz4.description: The clockwork assassin's Strikes deal an additional 3d6 precision damage to flat-footed creatures.

GtoDWNmX34925xMc.name: Unbalancing Blow
GtoDWNmX34925xMc.description: Creatures hit by the clockwork assassin's rapier hand Strike are flat-footed until the start of the clockwork assassin's next turn.

eJY1bfWIhxuD4h0H.name: Delay Condition
eJY1bfWIhxuD4h0H.description: The binumir's dual spirit takes longer to be affected by detrimental effects. When the binumir is the target of an effect that imparts the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Confused}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.9qGBRpbX9NEwtAAr]{Controlled}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AdPVz7rbaVSRxHFg]{Fascinated}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned} condition, the condition is automatically suppressed until the end of the binumir's next turn.

Zc0ocF6ln2ziU1iE.name: Agonizing Wail
Zc0ocF6ln2ziU1iE.description:
The binumir unleashes a distressing cry that fills others with wrenching sadness. Creatures within 30 feet must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:17] save.

Critical Success The target is unaffected and is temporarily immune to Agonizing Wail for 1 minute.

Success The target can't use reactions for 1 round.

Failure The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} and can't use reactions for 1 minute as it sobs uncontrollably. It can attempt a new Will save to end the effect at the end of each of its turns.

Critical Failure As failure, but the target can't make saves to end the effect.

wAYzRxbZPCt548k7.name: Dual Assault
wAYzRxbZPCt548k7.description:
The binumir makes four Strikes; no more than two can be against the same target.

These attacks count toward the binumir's multiple attack penalty, but the penalty doesn't increase until after all the attacks have been made.

Inky Tendrils.name: Agents of Edgewatch
Inky Tendrils.description: Six giant tentacles reach up from the ink lake, grabbing any foes in reach and dragging them underwater.
Inky Tendrils.hazardDisable:
@Check[type:athletics|dc:48|name:Disable Athletics] (legendary) or @Check[type:athletics|dc:45|name:Disable Acrobatics]{Acrobatics} (master) to tie one tentacle into a knot, rendering it useless, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{Dispel Magic} (8th level; counteract DC 44) to counteract one tentacle.

The death of the Daemonic Rumormonger permanently dispels all the inky tendrils.
Inky Tendrils.hazardRoutine: (6 actions) The hazard loses 1 action for every tentacle that is disabled or destroyed. The tentacles can combine their actions to use the hazard's Inky Imitator ability. A broken tentacle can still Strike, but it can't Grab. This hazard takes no multiple attack penalty.

Jonis Flakfatter.name: Jonis Flakfatter
Jonis Flakfatter.npcAllSaves: +2 status to all saves vs. disease and poison

rfWEzJifktPB3Mm1.name: +1 Spell Storing Dagger (contains crisis of faith)
rfWEzJifktPB3Mm1.description: This small, bladed weapon is held in one hand and used to stab a creature in close combat. It can also be thrown.

3XpnxOq9HQF7125Y.name: Religious Symbol (Norgorber)
3XpnxOq9HQF7125Y.description: This piece of wood or silver is emblazoned with an image representing a deity. Some divine spellcasters, such as clerics, can use a religious symbol of their deity as a divine focus to use certain abilities and cast some spells. A religious symbol must be held in one hand to use it.

7nwDQbdYpJ5U6EZs.name: Call Toxins
7nwDQbdYpJ5U6EZs.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:30]{30 feet} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{Aura}

Flakfatter exudes an aura that makes poisons more potent. His melee Strikes deal an additional [[/r 2d8[persistent,poison]]]. Creatures in the aura attempting a flat check to remove persistent poison damage must roll twice and take the lower result. Flakfatter can suppress or resume this aura as a free action.

Ikix1zKqDpYhzRYA.name: Infector
Ikix1zKqDpYhzRYA.description: Flakfatter targets a creature within 30 feet that's currently subject to a poison affliction. The poison affliction progresses to the next stage.

fkyMMwCkFLHVH5BV.name: Steady Spellcasting
fkyMMwCkFLHVH5BV.description: If a reaction would disrupt Flakfatter's spellcasting action, he attempts a @Check[type:flat|dc:15] check. On a success, the action isn't disrupted.

of0eB3PZMwreV0L4.name: Furious Pacifier
of0eB3PZMwreV0L4.description: Lavarsus adds double his Strength modifier to any nonlethal melee Strikes he makes with a bludgeoning weapon.

GTs7sVH9yhH8mKkM.name: Nonlethal Training
GTs7sVH9yhH8mKkM.description:
Lavarsus has trained to take down suspects without killing them.

He can choose to make nonlethal attacks with any bludgeoning weapon without taking the usual penalty to his attack roll.

Gas Trap.name: Agents of Edgewatch
Gas Trap.description: A spring slams and locks the room's door before four hidden gas vents begin pumping poison gas into the chamber.
Gas Trap.hazardDisable: Four @Check[type:thievery|dc:20|name:Block Gas Vents|traits:action:disable-a-device] checks to block the gas vents, or a @Check[type:thievery|dc:26|name:Unlock Door|traits:action:pick-a-lock] check to unlock the door and escape
Gas Trap.hazardReset: The trap must be manually rearmed by unblocking the vents or replacing the poison gas tank in area E30.
Gas Trap.hazardRoutine:
(1 action) Each round on its initiative count, the trap pumps more toxic gas into the room.

Any breathing creature in the room takes [[/r 4d6[poison]]] damage (a successful @Check[type:fortitude|dc:22|traits:poison,damaging-effect] save halves the damage taken). If a creature acts before the trap on the first round, it has the option of holding its breath to postpone taking damage from the trap-holding one's breath after the trap's first action has no effect, since the air in the creature's lungs is already tainted. Locating and blocking one of the hidden gas vents reduces the poison damage by 1d6-if all four are blocked, the trap is disabled, though the door remains locked. Otherwise, the trap functions for 1 minute before all the gas is expended and characters in the room cease taking damage, after which the trap ventilates the room for 1 additional minute.

k1KchqR9i8uSyT6e.name: Combustible
k1KchqR9i8uSyT6e.description: The first time each round that the Daemonic Infector takes fire damage, his fumes combust, dealing [[/r 30[fire]]] damage to all other creatures within the area of his toxic fumes aura.

zchaebxlIBynZinm.name: Toxic Fumes
zchaebxlIBynZinm.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:10]{10 feet} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{Aura}

A creature that enters or begins its turn within the aura must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:44] save.

On a failed save, the creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1}, and on a critical failure, it's also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1} for 1 minute. In addition, creatures within the aura attempting a flat check to remove @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Poison Damage} must roll twice and take the lower result.

uXNPc5LpmbvMlOa5.name: Breathe Death
uXNPc5LpmbvMlOa5.description:
The Daemonic Infector exhales a @Template[type:line|distance:30] of concentrated fumes.

Each creature in the area takes [[/r 12d10[poison]]] damage (@Check[type:fortitude|dc:44|basic:true] save; on a critical failure the creature is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1}).

The Infector can't Breathe Death again for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}.

Ez5LQ3xID56lShet.name: Infector
Ez5LQ3xID56lShet.description: The Daemonic targets a creature within 30 feet that's currently subject to a poison affliction. The poison affliction progresses to the next stage.

CU5CXS5c5trwAd9g.name: Steady Spellcasting
CU5CXS5c5trwAd9g.description: If a reaction would disrupt the Daemonic Infector's spellcasting action, he attempts a @Check[type:flat|dc:15] check. On a success, the action isn't disrupted.

WeIVzFTJRVOOXc8w.name: Magic Susceptibility
WeIVzFTJRVOOXc8w.description:
An almiraj takes a -2 status penalty to saving throws against occult spells.

Any beneficial occult spells with a duration of 1 round or longer cast on the almiraj last twice as long.

oIOsV3m1VCQehtGp.name: Magic Horn
oIOsV3m1VCQehtGp.description:
Any living creature slain by the almiraj's horn Strike immediately becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dTwPJuKgBQCMxixg]{Petrified} with no saving throw, in addition to dying.

A severed almiraj horn retains a wisp of its former magic; in combat, the horn can be wielded as a +1 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.rQWaJhI5Bko5x14Z]{dagger} or, if affixed to a shaft, a +1 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.tOhoGvmCMw4JpWcS]{spear}

Clockwork Poison Bomb.name: Agents of Edgewatch
Clockwork Poison Bomb.description: A clockwork bomb releases gouts of poisonous smoke. The smoke issues forth from a single nozzle attached to two tanks of pressurized poison
Clockwork Poison Bomb.hazardDisable: Three @Check[type:thievery|dc:31|name:Disable a Latch|traits:action:disable-a-device] (expert) checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.cYdz2grcOcRt4jk6]{Disable a Device} to disable the latches that lock the nozzle in place, then one @Check[type:thievery|dc:35|name:Turn Off Nozzle|traits:action:disable-a-device] (master) check to Disable a Device to turn off the nozzle; DCs decrease by 2 if Oggvurm is immobilized, paralyzed, unconscious, or dead
Clockwork Poison Bomb.hazardReset: The trap issues smoke for 3 minutes before its tanks run dry. The tanks must be replaced before the bomb can be reactivated.
Clockwork Poison Bomb.hazardRoutine: (1 action) On its turn, the bomb spews forth a smoky gout of airborne @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.WvDbdESFJY6Be2u1]{Blackfinger Blight} poison. The cloud fills a 20-foot radius, or a 10-foot radius if only one tank remains intact. If the bomb is already in the center of a blackfinger blight cloud, the radius of that cloud increases by 20 feet (or 10 feet, if only one tank remains intact) instead.

c9xP7D2JUcu3WRuz.description:
This small pendant is usually shaped like a humanoid skull or small animal skull.

Activate 3 Interact

Frequency three times per day

Effect You become undetectable to undead creatures for 10 minutes. Undead can't see, hear, or smell you, nor detect you with sensory capabilities such as scent or tremorsense. A creature can attempt a single DC 18 Will saving throw to ignore this effect. If an undead has reason to believe that undetected opponents are present, it can still attempt to Seek or Strike you. If you attempt to use a positive spell to damage undead, use Command Undead, touch or damage an undead creature, or attack any creature while warded in this manner, the pendant's effects immediately end. An undead creature who observes you in this manner or one who succeeds at the Will save is immune to the corpseward pendant for 24 hours.

VNhWmP9iCwh5JnM0.name: Hunting Spider Venom (in Reaper's Lancet)
VNhWmP9iCwh5JnM0.description:
This venom erodes its target's defenses, aiding the spider in securing prey.

Activate D Interact (Injury)

Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:21|name:Hunting Spider Venom]

Maximum Duration 6 rounds

Stage 1 [[/r 1d10[poison]]] damage and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} (1 round)

Stage 2 [[/r 1d12[poison]]] damage, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1}, and flat-footed (1 round)

Stage 3 [[/r 2d6[poison]]] damage, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 2}, and flat-footed (1 round)

JQLaH8N9rTPhEzqj.name: Sword Cane Duelist
JQLaH8N9rTPhEzqj.description: Each round, Pratchett can Strike once with each component of a sword cane without incurring the usual multiple attack penalty. Subsequent attacks incur the multiple attack penalty as usual.

Waxworks Onslaught Trap.name: Agents of Edgewatch
Waxworks Onslaught Trap.description: Four huge tubs containing congealed wax, enchanted to melt and envelop unwary intruders, each sit atop a cold fire.
Waxworks Onslaught Trap.hazardDisable: @Check[type:thievery|dc:43|name:Drain Wax from a Tub|traits:action:disable-a-device] (master) to drain the wax from a tub or @Check[type:athletics|dc:45|name:Push Through Wax|traits:action:force-open] (master) to push through the wax blocking a sealed door and escape (other creatures must push their own way through, as the wax reseals)
Waxworks Onslaught Trap.hazardReset: The trap deactivates and resets after 1 hour. At that time, the wax in the tubs cools and congeals, and any wax elsewhere in the room magically goes back into the tubs.
Waxworks Onslaught Trap.hazardRoutine: (4 actions) The trap loses 1 action each turn per drained or destroyed tub. On each action, a different tub spews hot wax at a random creature in the room, dealing 3d12 fire damage to the target and all adjacent creatures (@Check[type:reflex|dc:35|basic:true]). On a failure or critical failure, the creature is also encased in hot wax. A creature that starts its turn encased in wax takes 8d12 fire damage and is immobilized until it Escapes the hardening wax (DC 35). Each turn it remains encased, the damage dealt by the hot wax decreases by 2d12 but the DC to Escape increases by 2 (minimum 0 damage, maximum DC 43). A creature that can't get free from the wax might suffocate.

Freezing Alarm.name: Agents of Edgewatch
Freezing Alarm.description: Miniature snowflake-shaped glyphs on the ground cause a layer of ice to ripple over the floor of the room and sound a silent alarm.
Freezing Alarm.hazardDisable: @Check[type:arcana|dc:53|name:Disable Arcana] (legendary) to draw a fiery counteracting glyph over each snowflake, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{Dispel Magic} (9th level, counteract DC 48)

Rhevanna.name: Rhevanna
Rhevanna.npcAllSaves: +1 status to all saves vs. magic

II1iKHEPt0qdurXn.name: Plunder Life
II1iKHEPt0qdurXn.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:60]{60 feet} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{Aura}

When a healing effect restores Hit Points to a non-fiend creature in the aura, the amount of Hit Points restored is halved. The rhevanna gains temporary Hit Points equal to the amount of Hit Points restored.

The rhevanna loses any remaining temporary Hit Points after 1 minute.

JnTr0G2JvwVYzdfR.name: Detaining Strike
JnTr0G2JvwVYzdfR.description:
Frequency once per round

Trigger The rhevanna hits a creature with a weapon Strike

Effect The rhevanna casts an innate @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.ksLCg62cLOojw3gN]{Dimensional Anchor} spell on the creature.

SMwhRQyOrogJbUal.name: Lifedrinker
SMwhRQyOrogJbUal.description:
Trigger The rhevanna kills a living creature of at least 16th level

Effect The rhevanna drinks the triggering creature's life force and regains [[/r 40[healing]]]{40 Hit Points}. If the triggering creature is a celestial, the rhevanna instead regains [[/r 80[healing]]]{80 Hit Points}.

1cQlKfzWAd8gXGFa.name: Malefic Binding
1cQlKfzWAd8gXGFa.description:
The rhevanna can target celestials with their @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.GYmXvS9NJ7QwfWGg]{Bind Soul} ability, and a gem containing a celestial bound by a rhevanna has Hardness 40.

If the rhevanna destroys a gem in which they placed a celestial, the celestial is destroyed forever.

The Laughing Fiend's Greeting.name: Agents of Edgewatch
The Laughing Fiend's Greeting.description: Subtle but deadly magical runes link this mural to Kharnas's master. Good- or neutral-aligned creatures who examine the mural witness the castle's drawbridge silently descend, revealing an endless darkness.
The Laughing Fiend's Greeting.hazardDisable: @Check[type:thievery|dc:44|name:Disable Thievery] (legendary) to obscure or mar the magical runes set into the mural, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{Dispel Magic} (9th level; counteract DC 42) to counteract the mural

Canopy Drop.name: Agents of Edgewatch
Canopy Drop.description: A trapdoor, connected to floor sensors, opens in the section of floor marked on the map, while the surrounding floor suddenly tilts to a 45-degree angle and the fountains in the wall begin spraying at high pressure, making the tile slippery and pushing creatures toward the open chute.
Canopy Drop.hazardDisable: @Check[type:thievery|dc:23|name:Jam Trapdoor Mechanism|traits:action:disable-a-device] (expert) to jam the mechanisms and keep the trapdoor from opening, or to locate the bypass switch hidden under a stair riser just outside the room

kfZVz80JupwQ5DE1.name: Bloody Chain Aura
kfZVz80JupwQ5DE1.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:20]{20 feet} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{Aura}

Chains of blood bind a bleeding creature to the Daemonic Skinner.

Creatures in range that are taking @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Bleed Damage} can't move out of the aura.

The Skinner can have only one aura active at a time.

She can switch her active aura as an Interact action.

cdoPISuZdSbxOwT1.name: Spell Choke
cdoPISuZdSbxOwT1.description:
Trigger A creature taking @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Bleed Damage} within 30 feet of the Daemonic Skinner Casts a Spell with a verbal component or speaks

Effect The Skinner wills the triggering creature's blood to gush from their mouth and constrict their throat. The target's spell is disrupted.

The target must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:20] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 2}.

rJu8a6w24iFChezA.name: Transfusion Aura
rJu8a6w24iFChezA.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:30]{30 feet} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{Aura}

Any time a creature in the aura takes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Bleed Damage}, the Daemonic Skinner regains the same number of Hit Points as the damage dealt.

The Skinner can have only one aura active at a time.

She can switch her active aura as an Interact action.

1h5CBWyXY0MAHGtm.name: Bloody Sneak Attack
1h5CBWyXY0MAHGtm.description:
Any creature taking @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Bleed Damage} is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} against the Daemonic Skinner's attacks. When attacking a flat-footed creature, the Skinner deals an additional 2d6 precision damage.

When the monster Strikes a creature that has the flat-footed} condition with an agile or finesse melee weapon, an agile or finesse unarmed attack, or a ranged weapon attack, it also deals the listed precision damage. For a ranged attack with a thrown weapon, that weapon must also be an agile or finesse weapon.

IEuErW2Q6KaGlk21.name: Hook and Flay
IEuErW2Q6KaGlk21.description:
Requirements The Daemonic Skinner has a creature grabbed with her blood chain or a creature is affected by her bloody chain aura

Effect The Skinner pulls the creature into the nearest open adjacent square and makes a cleaver Strike against the creature.

3aasDsiXoE4xtSVZ.name: Distracting Shadows
3aasDsiXoE4xtSVZ.description: Skebs can use creatures that are at least one size larger than themself as cover for the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]{Hide} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.VMozDqMMuK5kpoX4]{Sneak} actions.

ZEbYuhDFGc3fADE1.description:
Skebs deals 1d6 extra precision damage to flat-footed creatures.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.SneakAttack]

Water Elemental Vessel.name: Water Elemental Vessel
Water Elemental Vessel.description: Spellcasters create elemental vessels by harvesting raw elemental energy and then binding it within a specially enchanted magic circle to grant it life.

N85UwJsuAe8nwuWV.name: Spell Circle
N85UwJsuAe8nwuWV.description: By performing an hour-long ritual, an elemental vessel can form a spell circle with an arcane or primal spellcaster. After the spell circle is formed, other spellcasters can join the spell circle by performing the same hour-long ritual while assisted by at least one spellcaster already in the spell circle. Each member of the spell circle must contribute at least one spell to the elemental vessel. The spellcaster permanently loses access to a spell slot equal to the spell's level and the elemental vessel adds the contributed spell to its list of arcane innate spells (regardless of the spell's original type). An elemental vessel can be imbued with no more than three spells per spell level. If the elemental vessel is destroyed, all members of the spell circle regain the spell slots they contributed to the creature. The arcane innate spells shown below represent a typical spell list for an elemental vessel, but each elemental vessel is likely to have different spells depending on what its spell circle has contributed.

fgprZ9vs1zfRUz3o.name: Dispel Vulnerability
fgprZ9vs1zfRUz3o.description: Whenever a creature successfully counteracts one of its spells, the vessel permanently loses access to that spell and takes damage equal to 4 × the spell's level. The spell circle member who contributed that spell regains access to their contributed spell slot.

jJSKOhaRoCp1WwP4.name: Inhabit Vessel
jJSKOhaRoCp1WwP4.description: Any member of the elemental vessel's spell circle can spend 3 actions to mentally inhabit the vessel for 1 round. While they inhabit the vessel, the inhabiter controls the vessel's actions, and the vessel uses the inhabiter's Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma modifiers for all checks. Only one creature can inhabit an elemental vessel at a time.

g8bRqHNpfEqsTYyx.name: Internal Spell Strike
g8bRqHNpfEqsTYyx.description: The elemental vessel targets an engulfed creature with one of its spells. The spell must have a range of touch.

Lusca.name: Lusca
Lusca.description: A lusca is a predatory sea monster that resembles a three-headed shark with the body of an octopus. Ferocious electrical storms usually herald a lusca's arrival; such violent bursts of electricity result from the creature's superconductive flesh, which allows the lusca to store energy from lightning strikes that it can then discharge at foes.

DSVJsEHiWFPACcNX.name: Attack of Opportunity
DSVJsEHiWFPACcNX.description:
The lusca gains 2 extra reactions at the start of each of its turns that it can use only to make an Attack of Opportunity with its jaws. It can't use more than one Attack of Opportunity triggered by the same action.

Trigger A creature within the monster's reach uses a manipulate action or a move action, makes a ranged attack, or leaves a square during a move action it's using.

Effect The monster attempts a melee Strike against the triggering creature. If the attack is a critical hit and the trigger was a manipulate action, the monster disrupts that action. This Strike doesn't count toward the monster's multiple attack penalty, and its multiple attack penalty doesn't apply to this Strike.

RkUX9VYzuGsIycUb.name: Blood Scent
RkUX9VYzuGsIycUb.description: The lusca can smell blood in the water up to 1 mile away.

uW2CbK6jDKtg1sG4.name: Storm Bringer
uW2CbK6jDKtg1sG4.description: When the lusca is near the surface for more than 1 hour, clouds appear and deliver a thunderstorm with a 2-mile radius centered on its location. The weather returns to normal 1 hour after the lusca departs.

hDbNl3kiEPn8AUos.name: Capsize
hDbNl3kiEPn8AUos.description: The lusca tries to capsize an adjacent aquatic vessel of its size or smaller. It must succeed at an Athletics check with a DC of 35 (reduced by 5 for each size smaller the vessel is than the lusca) or the pilot's Sailing Lore DC, whichever is higher.

VzGeaeMNgzVgxvGo.name: Lusca Venom
VzGeaeMNgzVgxvGo.description:
Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:38]

Maximum Duration 6 rounds

Stage 1 4d6 poison damage and clumsy 1 (1 round)

Stage 2 6d6 poison damage and clumsy 2 (1 round)

f9SGRyWKHiuofcI9.name: Ravenous Jaws
f9SGRyWKHiuofcI9.description: The lusca makes three jaws Strikes, each against a different target. These attacks count toward the lusca's multiple attack penalty, but the penalty doesn't increase until after the lusca makes all of these attacks. If the lusca subsequently uses the Grab action, it Grabs any number of creatures it hit with Ravenous Jaws.

4nrWl1NPbkOzx2Nq.name: Victor's Medallion from the Challenge of Sky and Heaven

UylfhYpRBAz42DrH.name: Flurry of Blows
UylfhYpRBAz42DrH.description:
Shristi makes two unarmed Strikes. If both hit the same creature, combine their damage for the purposes of resistances and weaknesses. He applies his multiple attack penalty to the Strikes normally.

As it has the flourish trait, Shristi can use Flurry of Blows only once per turn.

7PJ0xQKU3T5EtaPW.name: Heaven's Thunder
7PJ0xQKU3T5EtaPW.description:
Frequency twice per day

Effect With a loud shout, Shristi unleashes his ki as a crackling shroud of thunder and lightning that engulfs his body. Until the end of his next turn, Shristi's unarmed Strikes and Strikes with weapons that have the monk trait deal an additional 3 electricity damage and 3 sonic damage.

1a9J9jdVUsp4RIxQ.name: Sky and Heaven Stance
1a9J9jdVUsp4RIxQ.description:
Shristi enters a combat stance perfected by past champions of the Challenge of Sky and Heaven. While in this stance, the only Strikes Shristi can make are skyward slash unarmed attacks. These deal 1d10 slashing damage; are in the brawling group; and have the nonlethal, unarmed, and versatile P traits.

While in Sky and Heaven Stance, Shristi gains resistance 2 to electricity and sonic damage.

Pelmo.name: Pelmo
Pelmo.description:
The frontline fighters of goblin tribes prefer to fight in large groups-especially when they can outnumber their foes at least three to one.

These small humanoids have green or gray skin and large heads with wide ears. While some goblins are civilized and have worked hard to be considered upstanding members of humanoid communities, most are impetuous and vicious creatures who delight in wreaking havoc. These goblins think nothing of slaughtering livestock, stealing infants, or burning down a building purely for momentary delight. They revel in playing malicious tricks on taller humanoids, whom they call "longshanks."

Goblins are superstitious, with an intense awe of magic and a fascination with fire; goblins who master magic or fire earn great respect from their kin. Most other humanoids find it difficult to understand goblins' outlook: they hate canines but eagerly share their lairs with so-called "goblin dogs," they fearlessly attack larger creatures but are terrified of horses, and they despise vegetables yet consider pickles a delicacy. To a goblin, of course, these are all perfectly sensible life choices.

rcbgrGgDNJ56oPrA.description:
Activate A Strike

Alchemist's fire is a combination of volatile liquids that ignite when exposed to air. Alchemist's fire deals 1d8 fire damage, [[/r 1[persistent,fire]]] damage, and 1 fire splash damage.

32FbUxGNpWinXjEq.name: Goblin Scuttle
32FbUxGNpWinXjEq.description:
Trigger A goblin ally ends a move action adjacent to Pelmo.

Effect Pelmo @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.UHpkTuCtyaPqiCAB]{Steps}.

5hCSuILSsdP2wKtN.name: Cheek Pouches
5hCSuILSsdP2wKtN.description: A ratfolk has stretchy cheek pouches that can store up to 1 cubic foot of objects. The ratfolk can remove or store an item using the Interact action. As long as the ratfolk has at least one object in its cheek pouches, its speech is noticeably difficult to understand.

hrbhUgMW0KZvWovb.name: Katar Specialist
hrbhUgMW0KZvWovb.description: Gref has trained extensively with the katar blade. Any katar he wields gains the finesse trait.

viGvtlLGXHhsAVh8.name: Quick Stow
viGvtlLGXHhsAVh8.description:
Frequency once per round.

Effect Gref stores one held item of light or negligible Bulk in his cheek pouches.

mjEOGwxDnDNV6VB0.name: Swarming
mjEOGwxDnDNV6VB0.description:
A ratfolk can end its movement in the same square as an ally that also has this ability.

Only two such creatures can share the same space.

933yJ4bfZhr9zTIX.name: Collapse
933yJ4bfZhr9zTIX.description:
Trigger The Iroran skeleton is critically hit

Effect The Iroran skeleton collapses into a pile of bones and the attack deals damage for a hit, rather than a critical hit.

The skeleton can reform in a standing position as an action, but until it does, it is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed}.

shJIHzhh4j6cG3tv.name: Flurry of Claws
shJIHzhh4j6cG3tv.description:
The Iroran skeleton makes two claw Strikes. If both hit the same creature, the damage is combined for the purpose of resistances and weaknesses.

The multiple attack penalty applies to the Strikes as normal.

ZBfbG1IkIDHWmhM2.name: Wall Run
ZBfbG1IkIDHWmhM2.description: The Iroran skeleton can Stride along vertical surfaces, such as walls, as long as it begins and ends its movement on a horizontal surface.

GutcPWbxQjMoihFA.name: Water Step
GutcPWbxQjMoihFA.description: The Iroran skeleton can Stride across liquid surfaces. If it ends its movement on a liquid surface, it falls in as normal.

sVBakTcoJU3kPGlY.name: Whirlwind Kick
sVBakTcoJU3kPGlY.description: The Iroran skeleton makes a single Strike and compares the result to the AC of all creatures within its reach, dealing damage to each creature hit.

WWLbZOyOAUEoJrVO.name: Fast Swallow
WWLbZOyOAUEoJrVO.description:
Trigger The minchgorm Grabs a creature in its jaws

Effect The minchgorm uses Swallow Whole.

kVdw249CmzAbj17U.name: Riptide
kVdw249CmzAbj17U.description: Tentacles of water rise up and attempt to Grapple all enemies within 15 feet of the minchgorm. The minchgorm attempts an Athletics check against the Fortitude DC of each creature in the area. On a success, the creature is grabbed (Escape DC 40). On a critical success, or a success against a creature that is already grabbed, the target begins to drown.

SczLJpfQwYYTKEvD.name: Watery Simulacra
SczLJpfQwYYTKEvD.description: The minchgorm raises up to eight figures from nearby water, each appearing in an empty space within 60 feet of the minchgorm. A simulacrum can take any shape of size Medium or smaller that the minchgorm desires, including that of a specific individual or object, but is always plainly made of water. The minchgorm can speak, cast spells, and use its senses through its simulacra, spending actions for a simulacrum on a one-for-one basis. By using a single action with the concentrate trait, the minchgorm can cause any number of simulacra to Fly, Step, Stride, or Swim up to 60 feet. A simulacrum uses the minchgorm's AC and saving throws and has 30 Hit Points. A minchgorm can have up to eight simulacra in existence at once.
